description: A spare pair of socks to work with the Lenz Heat Sock battery-powered heated sock system.Socks are made of thick blend of synthetics, silk and merino wool that wicks moisture well.Integrated heating element completely wraps around both the top and bottom of the toes as well as the forefoot for the ultimate in cozy warmth.Ergonomic shaping works inside most winter boots.Padding on the shins adds comfort for hiking and skiing.Soft toe seams.Unisex sizes: Small fits Euro 35-38, Medium fits Euro 39-41, Large fits 42-44, XL fits 45-47.Socks only. Battery sold separately.
name: Lenz Heat Socks 5.0 (Merino and Silk) Socks (Socks Only) - Unisex
